message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! I think you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $13500.
Thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate your generosity. However, I am only able to pay up to $12000 for it.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm afraid I need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering it to you for $13000.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I am still unable to go above $12000 for the product.
